show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Prescriptions for Health, 5/7/12: Garlic Superior to Antibiotics for Common Food-borne Illnesses Vitamin D3... <!--more--> Supplementation Treats Prostate Cancer Vitamin D3 Protects Against Viruses, Cancer and Autoimmunity The Dark Side of Beta Carotene Callers: Trevor (Brooklyn): garlic topically with caution John: (Laguna, CA): Prostate Cancer and PSA’s.
Suggestions re.
MRI with Spectroscopy and 3D4D Ultrasound Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: The Dangers of GMO’s and comon GMO foods not labelled Black Pepper (piperine) can block the formation of new fat cells.
It’s a fat fighter!
